title: Bug 6656 - Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller on Linux, running build 20011127 (does not happen on build 20011116 on Nt2000), the tool items move below the label. However, the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X) also move down. This may cause confusion for users.
OB: On Linux, running build 20011127 (does not happen on build 20011116 on Nt2000), when a view like the Navigator is resized smaller, the tool items move below the label, along with the pulldown menu icon and the close icon.
EB: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller on Linux, running build 20011127 (does not happen on build 20011116 on Nt2000), the tool items should remain aligned with the label even when the view is resized.
SR:
1. Open the Navigator view.
2. Resize the view to a smaller size on Linux, running build 20011127 (does not happen on build 20011116 on Nt2000).
3. Observe that the tool items, pulldown menu icon, and close icon move down below the label.
